content1.title: ‚úàÔ∏è K-MediTour Program
content1.desc1: K-MediTour Program is a fully integrated medical travel program designed to make both your treatment and travel in South Korea smooth, safe, and unforgettable.
content1.desc2: From initial consultation to post-treatment follow-up, Medi-City coordinates every detail‚Äîso you can focus on what matters most: your health, recovery, and memorable experiences in Korea.

content2.title: üîÑ How It Works
content2.desc: Our streamlined process ensures a hassle-free experience from start to finish.

step1.title: Request & Document Submission
step1.1: Please click the ‚ÄòContact Us‚Äô button to begin your consultation and submit the required documents as guided.
step1.2: Guide you to the right program based on your needs and assist you through the required documentation.

step2.title: Schedule & Cost Confirmation
step2.1: Please click the ‚ÄòContact Us‚Äô button to begin your consultation and submit the required documents as guided.
step2.2: Provide a customized itinerary including treatment, accommodation, and tour options, along with a detailed cost estimate.

step3.title: Make Payment & Pre-departure Preparation
step3.1: Review the suggested treatment and tour schedule, and confirm your availability.
step3.2: Arrange visa, book flights and accommodation, and finalize all pre-departure preparations.

step4.title: Travel & Receive Treatment
step4.1: Travel to Korea and receive medical treatment, enjoy the tour.
step4.2: Pick you up at the airport, escort to hospital, support interpretation and tour activities.

step5.title: Return & Aftercare Support
step5.1: Return home and join follow-up care if needed.
step5.2: Arrange airport drop-off, coordinate rehab and check-up schedules..

content3.title: ü©∫ Medical Treatment Program Overview
content3.desc1: We offer a wide range of medical specialties through our partnered hospitals,
content3.desc2: ensuring personalized care tailored to each patient‚Äôs needs.

content4.title: üèûÔ∏è Tour(Seoul Tour, Gangwon Tour) Overview
content4.desc1: More than just treatment‚Äîimmerse yourself in the charm of Korea with Drako,
content4.desc2: by visiting the most iconic K-drama and K-pop landmarks.
content4.desc3: - K-drama filming locations: ‚ÄúBusiness Proposal‚Äù, ‚ÄúOur Beloved Summer‚Äù, ‚ÄúGuardian: The Lonely and Great God‚Äù
content4.desc4: - K-pop spots: BLACKPINK & BTS MV locations, idol-favorite hot places

part3.title: Why Korea?
part3.subtitle: World-Class Medical Excellence
part3.desc1: South Korea is globally recognized for its world-class healthcare system,
part3.desc2: advanced medical technology, and increasing trust from international patients.

content1.title: üèÜ World-Class Healthcare, Globally Recognized
content1.desc1: Korea has been ranked as the country with the second best healthcare system in the world.
content1.desc2: This index ranks 110 countries based on various factors contributing to overall health.
content1.1: Countries With The Best Health Care Systems, 2024

content2.title: üñ•Ô∏è Leading in Early Diagnosis & Medical Tech
content2.desc1: Korea leads globally in the availability of mammographs and maintains above-OECD-average access to CT scanners
content2.desc2: and MRI units, underscoring its strength in early diagnosis and advanced medical infrastructure.
content2.source: Source: OECD Health Statistics 2024; WHO Global atlas of medical devices 2022.

content3.title: üß≥ Asia‚Äôs Rising Star in Medical Tourism
content3.desc1: The number of foreign patients in Korea surged to 1.17 million in 2024, marking a 93.2% increase from the previous year
content3.desc2: and solidifying the country's status as a leading medical tourism hub in Asia.
content3.1: Number of Foreign Patients Visiting South Korea (2021-2024)
content3.source: Source: Ministry of Health and Welfare, Republic of Korea

content4.title: üó∫Ô∏è Unique Travel Experiences
content4.desc1: Beyond treatment, Korea offers unforgettable cultural and travel experiences
content4.desc2: ‚Äîblending the vibrant charm of Seoul and the natural beauty of Gangwon into a healing experience like no other.

1.title: üé¨ Be the Star of Your Own K-Drama
1.desc1: From the romantic views of Namsan Tower to the peaceful scenery of Gangwon‚Äôs beaches, walk through the iconic filming locations of your favorite K-dramas.
1.desc2: Imagine recovering while enjoying the same sights you've seen on screen.

2.title: üé§ K-Pop & K-Lifestyle Experiences
2.desc1: Explore the heart of K-pop culture‚Äîvisit entertainment agencies and the hotspots your favorite idols have visited.
2.desc2: Feel closer to the stars you love while getting the care you need.

3.title: üíÑ K-Beauty & Wellness
3.desc1: Korea is also the birthplace of the world-renowned K-beauty trend.
3.desc2: Enjoy personalized skincare consultations, aesthetic treatments, and wellness retreats that blend modern science with traditional Korean techniques.

content1.title: üß≠ From Indonesia to Korea‚ÄîEvery Step, Fully Supported
content1.desc1: We go beyond just medical appointments. Our service offers personalized care before, during, and after treatment,
content1.desc2: starting from your departure in Indonesia to your safe return‚Äîso you can focus on healing while we handle the rest.
